module.name: ebay
module.description: Esporta facilmente i tuoi prodotti da PrestaShop a eBay, uno dei più grandi mercati del mondo, per raggiungere nuovi clienti e incrementare le tue vendite
module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.description_full: Esporta facilmente i tuoi prodotti da PrestaShop a eBay, uno dei più grandi mercati del mondo, per raggiungere nuovi clienti e incrementare le tue vendite.   Approfitta ora dell'offerta speciale : 90 giorni d'inscrizione gratuita*
module.additional_description: • Puoi sviluppare un proficuo canale di vendita utilizzando eBay come nuova via d'accesso  al mercato. • I tuoi prodotti raggiungeranno un pubblico globale di oltre cento milioni di potenziali acquirenti. • Puoi creare inserzioni e vendere attraverso entrambi i canali da un unico luogo. • Potrai gestire tutti i tuoi ordini attraverso i canali contribuendo a evitare di vendere più di quello che hai in magazzino.   ﻿

module.name: envoimoinscher
module.description: Find the best price for your shipment. Compare and order carriers offers at negotiated rates
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Find the best price for your shipment. Compare and order carriers offers at negotiated rates.

module.name: hipay
module.description: Gestisce le tue transazioni online
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Gestisce le tue transazioni online. Garzie a HiPay puoi accedere a soluzioni di pagamento internazionali e locali (Visa, MasterCard, ING, Bancontact Mistercash, Sofort, Payshop, Boleto bancario, Ideal, Sisal...)

module.name: kwixo
module.description: Accepts payments by "Kwixo" and boost your sales!   ATTENTION: The online payment service provider Kwixo will end on monday 31 august 2015 at night
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Accepts payments by "Kwixo" and boost your sales!   ATTENTION: The online payment service provider Kwixo will end on monday 31 august 2015 at night
module.additional_description: ATTENTION: The online payment service provider Kwixo will end on monday 31 august 2015 at night     Why Kwixo ?  Maximize sales by providing a simple, fast and secure payment.Secure your turnover with the tools in the fight against fraud CB .Increase your average cart through the provision of integrated credit and service payment receipt.Reassure your customers with the support of the Credit Agricole Group.Enjoy competitive rates.

module.name: mailjet
module.description: Create and send transactional and marketing newsletters. Increase your merchant revenue with abandon cart and other triggered emails
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Create and send transactional and marketing newsletters. Increase your merchant revenue with abandon cart and other triggered emails. Analyze everything, including opens, clicks and how much revenue each newsletter generates, straight from within your PrestaShop account! This version of Mailjet’s add-on is compatible with only Mailjet v3 users. If you are a v1 user (any account created before April 2014), please request to get your account migrated via https://www.mailjet.com/support/ticket Discover our brand new user guide : https://www.mailjet.com/guides/prestashop-user-guide/
module.additional_description: With Mailjet, optimise your  deliverability,  get your emails delivered to the inbox and avoid the spam folder. Install the official Mailjet PrestaShop add-on and get access to:  ROI Stats:  Real-time sales and net revenue figures per marketing newsletter. Find out who opened, clicked, bounced or unsubscribed from your mailings, create graphs, export data and much more Setup triggered email events based on customer behavior (birthday promo, abandoned cart, survey request, …) Group and create specific customer segments  to send targeted  content to thus increasing engagement and  open rates Automatically remove unsubscribers from your contact lists and Newsletter list to keep your deliverability reputation intact Personalize your mailings with any contact list properties Create & manage all Mailjet campaigns and contacts directly within PrestaShop

module.name: moneybookers
module.description: Più di 36 milioni di utenti e 158.000 negozianti già si affidano a Skrill
module.author: MyBBservices
module.description_full: Più di 36 milioni di utenti e 158.000 negozianti già si affidano a Skrill. I nostri clienti possono inviare e ricevere denaro in tutto il mondo, in 200 paesi e in 40 valute, in sicurezza e a basso costo, senza dover rivelare i propri dati finanziari.
module.additional_description: Più di 158.000 negozianti utilizzano Skrill – ecco perché:Nessun costo di configurazione o commissioni mensiliAccettiamo pagamenti da bancomat e carte di creditoFino a 100 ulteriori opzioni di pagamento localiI più alti standard di sicurezza (PCI DSS di livello 1)Inclusi controlli antifrodeConfigurazione gratis entro 72 ore

module.name: ogone
module.description: Ingenico Payment Services* : servizi di pagamento per incrementare il business dei merchant on-line Offriamo soluzioni di e-commerce innovative a più di 160
module.author: Kiwik
module.description_full: Ingenico Payment Services* : servizi di pagamento per incrementare il business dei merchant on-line Offriamo soluzioni di e-commerce innovative a più di 160.000 clienti in Europa e nel mondo *Già Ogone
module.additional_description: Un'attività commerciale può trarre vantaggio in diversi modi dalla scelta di Ingenico Payment Services come partner dei propri pagamenti: Gestiamo e proteggiamo i pagamenti su Internet, sia per gli shop on-line o su dispositivi mobili sia per l'accettazione telefonica degli ordini (MOTO). Siamo in grado di favorire l'accettazione di pagamenti, la ricezione degli incassi e la protezione delle attività dalle frodi.

module.name: paypal
module.description: I tuoi clienti si sentono tranquilli perché PayPal è sinonimo di sicurezza. Più di 140 milioni di persone nel mondo scelgono PayPal per pagare da computer e da dispositivi mobili
module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.description_full: I tuoi clienti si sentono tranquilli perché PayPal è sinonimo di sicurezza. Più di 140 milioni di persone nel mondo scelgono PayPal per pagare da computer e da dispositivi mobili. Offrilo anche tu. Con un unico conto PayPal, accetti pagamenti in 26 valute da 193 Paesi.
module.additional_description: Invia e ricevi denaro, senza fornire i tuoi dati personali.﻿ Puoi trasferire denaro gratuitamente* sul tuo conto bancario. O usare il saldo PayPal per i tuoi acquisti online.

module.name: twenga
module.description: Questo modulo ti permette di creare immediatamente un feed d'esportazione ottimizzato per Twenga e d'istallare il tuo tracking delle vendite facilmente
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Questo modulo ti permette di creare immediatamente un feed d'esportazione ottimizzato per Twenga e d'istallare il tuo tracking delle vendite facilmente. Esporta i tuoi prodotti su Twenga in pochi clic e ottieni nuovi clienti!
module.additional_description: Twenga, la guida di shopping con 9 anni di esperienza nell'e-commerce, vi aiuta a vendere efficacemente. Ottieni nuovi clienti scaricando il modulo Twenga. Twenga è una guida shopping che permette a milioni di persone che acquistano online di trovare i loro prodotti al miglior prezzo, nel negozio online di loro scelta. Il programma partner Twenga mira a fornire ai professionisti dell'e-commerce il traffico più qualificato, qualunque sia il loro settore di attività. Perché farsi indicizzare sulla piattaforma Twenga? Vendi di più attirando dei compratori qualificati: 4,5 milioni di visitatori unici al mese. Controlla il tuo budget: pagamento al CPC unicamente, nessun obbligo di restareSegui la tua attività: Interfaccia di controllo del traffico completo e performante Le tue garanzie: - Genera il tuo feed d'esportazione prodotti ottimizzato per Twenga in 1 clic - Installa facilmente il tracking delle vendite Twenga: godi di un traffico ottimizzato concentrato su i tuoi prodotti ad alto potenziale - Approfitta di un'assistenza tecnica e commerciale gratuita. - La tua iscrizione al programma commercianti è gratuita e senza obblighi di durata Più di 15.000 professionisti dell'e-commerce in Europa hanno già adottato la piattaforma di traffico Twenga.

module.name: fianetsceau
module.description: Questo modulo è disponibile solo per oggi la Francia. Per ulteriori informazioni, si prega di leggere la descrizione francese

module.name: mondialrelay
module.description: The Mondial Relay module developed with Prestashop allows stores to use the deliveries by Point Relais® (over 6300 traders proximity) and at home in France and Europe
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Mondial Relay module developed with Prestashop allows stores to use the deliveries by Point Relais® (over 6300 traders proximity) and at home in France and Europe. Mondial Relay shares his expertise with all merchants, regardless of their level of activity, proposing an offer without prerequisites of parcels quantity, without commitment period and no management fees or subscription.
module.additional_description: With this module, you will have a wider choice of delivery modes, your customers will appreciate the ability to be delivered by Point Relais® which you will improve your conversion rate.

module.name: tntcarrier
module.description: Offer your customers, different delivery methods with TNT. To read the description of this module, please select French language
module.author: Infostrates
module.description_full: Offer your customers, different delivery methods with TNT. To read the description of this module, please select French language.  Create your TNT account now !

module.name: trustedshops
module.description: Get better reviews with the Trustbadge®! Easily collect, show and manage real customer reviews. Integrate this module within minutes and display trust at first glance
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Get better reviews with the Trustbadge®! Easily collect, show and manage real customer reviews. Integrate this module within minutes and display trust at first glance.
module.additional_description: Genuine reviews from real people. Online shoppers can enter some personal data to give their reviews a social proof. Customers will trust you even more. Upload orders from previous customers and receive reviews within hours. Or collect reviews automatically with every purchase of your customers.

module.name: authorizeaim
module.description: Il pagamento Authorize.Net Gateway può aiutarvi a accettare carte di credito e pagamenti elettronici di controllo in modo rapido e conveniente . Più di 250.000 commercianti fiducia Authorize
module.author: PrestaShop

Più di 250.000 commercianti fiducia Authorize.Net di gestire le loro transazioni, aiutare a prevenire le frodi, e far crescere il loro business . Questo modulo è stato sviluppato per SIM Authorize.Net solo. AIM non è disponibile . Authorize.Net Fare riferimento al sito web per maggiori dettagli .﻿

module.name: ganalytics
module.description: Integrare Google Analytics script sul vostro negozio online
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Integrare Google Analytics script sul vostro negozio online.
module.additional_description: An ad click here, a page view there, a video watched on a tablet before bed... but which one clinched the sale? Google Analytics has the latest in full-credit measurement, so you see all the stops people take on the road to action. The result: a measurable way to improve campaigns and reach new audiences as they go through their days.

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Calculates shipping rates for United States Postal Service for Domestic shipping within the USA.

module.name: avalaratax
module.description: Avalara is a leading provider of sales tax automation software. We help you manage the complex rules and regulations related to transactional and indirect taxes
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Avalara is a leading provider of sales tax automation software. We help you manage the complex rules and regulations related to transactional and indirect taxes.   Avalara’s cloud-hosted solutions streamline and simplify the complicated and burdensome process of managing tax-related compliance activities and integrate with 300+ leading accounting, ERP and ecommerce systems.
module.additional_description: Fast. Eliminates the tedious work and complexity that goes into manually calculating and reporting sales taxes.Secure. The transaction takes place via a secure, encrypted Internet connection.Easy. Integrates seamlessly with existing business systems.Accurate. Continuously updates data, making accurate sales tax calculations available immediately.Affordable. Scalable, usage-based, Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) delivery model

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Provides an automated method to upgrade your shop to the latest PrestaShop version
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Provides an automated method to upgrade your shop to the latest PrestaShop version
module.additional_description: Enjoy the benefits of version 1.6 of PrestaShop in one click with this module that allows you to update easily your online store!

module.name: socolissimo
module.description: Offer your customer 5 different delivery methods with LaPoste
module.author: Quadra Informatique
module.description_full: Offer your customer 5 different delivery methods with LaPoste.
module.additional_description: You offer them and the ability to choose their home delivery mode (recovery mailbox or in person, with the possibility of delivery by appointment in the evening) or away from home (in Cityssimo space in the post office their choice or one of the local shops of our partner network).

module.name: payulatam
module.description: PayU Latam is the leading online payment service provider in Latin America with more than 20,000 clients
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PayU Latam is the leading online payment service provider in Latin America with more than 20,000 clients. PayU Latam’s multi-language and multi-currency platform has the most complete anti-fraud system in the region. The 70+ payment options allows its clients to reach the entire market with cash deposits, bank transfers, and local and international credit cards in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Mexico, Panama and Peru.

module.name: gamification
module.description: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!

module.description: Yotpo helps you generate tons of reviews and use them to drive qualified traffic and more sales to your store. Yotpo is free and takes 5 minutes to install
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Yotpo helps you generate tons of reviews and use them to drive qualified traffic and more sales to your store. Yotpo is free and takes 5 minutes to install.

module.name: gadwords
module.description: Google AdWords ti consente di pubblicare annunci accanto ai risultati di ricerca e raggiungere nuovi clienti proprio quando cercano su Google - e sulla sua rete - quello che offri
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Google AdWords ti consente di pubblicare annunci accanto ai risultati di ricerca e raggiungere nuovi clienti proprio quando cercano su Google - e sulla sua rete - quello che offri. Per iniziare ti offriamo €75 di pubblicità gratuita se spendi almeno €25. Scarica il modulo per ottenere il tuo codice promozionale e comminciare adesso!
module.additional_description: Sei alla ricerca di nuovi clienti online? Prestashop ha stretto una partnership con Google per aiutarti a promuoverti online. Google AdWords ti consente di pubblicare annunci accanto ai risultati di ricerca e raggiungere nuovi clienti proprio quando cercano su Google - e sulla sua rete - quello che offri. Per aiutarti a iniziare abbiamo collaborato con Google per darti €75* extra di credito pubblicitario per la tua campagna AdWords, che potrai utilizzare non appena avrai speso almeno €25. Ricevi €75 di credito* pubblicitario quando spendi almeno €25 sulla tua prima campagna AdWords. Chiama il numero 800 930 808.

module.name: firstdata
module.description: Accept Credit card payments today with First Data (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover, etc.)﻿!   Fast. Secure. Reliable
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept Credit card payments today with First Data (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover, etc.)﻿!   Fast. Secure. Reliable. PrestaShop and First Data have teamed up as industry leaders to help your business save money in online payment acceptance. With over 40 years of payment processing experience, Express Merchant Processing Solutions (EMPS) — powered by First Data has helped millions of businesses like yours bring fast, secure, effortless payments to their customers and affordable support—regardless of size.

module.name: pagseguro
module.description: PagSeguro offers the largest variety of payment terms available in the market. There are over 20 options available to the buyers, such as: online debit, bank slips and the PagSeguro credit card
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PagSeguro offers the largest variety of payment terms available in the market. There are over 20 options available to the buyers, such as: online debit, bank slips and the PagSeguro credit card.

module.name: paypalusa
module.description: PayPal is the fast, easy, secure way to accept payments online in 24 currencies from 193 countries around the globe. Your customers don't need a PayPal account to pay, and you get paid quickly
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: PayPal is the fast, easy, secure way to accept payments online in 24 currencies from 193 countries around the globe. Your customers don't need a PayPal account to pay, and you get paid quickly.﻿

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: SendinBlue : Il plugin "tutto in uno" per le tue Email & SMS (marketing e transazionali)
module.author: SendinBlue
module.description_full: SendinBlue : Il plugin "tutto in uno" per le tue Email & SMS (marketing e transazionali). Sincronizza i tuoi contatti Prestashop con SendinBlue, crea facilmente delle belle campagne email e comunica con i tuoi clienti attivi e potenziali.
module.additional_description: Con SendinBlue, potrai:Sincronizzare automaticamente i tuoi contatti sul tuo account SendinBlue e seguire le venditeCreare e inviare delle newsletter professionaliOttimizzare il recapito in inbox delle tue email transazionali (conferma di iscrizione, di ordine, ecc.)Seguire i risultati dei tuoi invii in tempo realeBeneficiare di un servizio clienti dedicato via email o telefonoLeggi il nostro tutorial : https://resources.sendinblue.com/it/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: prediggo
module.description: Through this module, Prediggo is offering you the possibility to increase your conversion rate by 30%. How? Sell Smarter
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Through this module, Prediggo is offering you the possibility to increase your conversion rate by 30%. How? Sell Smarter. ﻿  Enjoy 1-month free trial now with the promo code FREEMERCH14 !
module.additional_description: Both solutions require a fee. Do not hesitate to contact us for a quotation. High performance have been proven by A/B testingOur patented semantic technology represents the next generation in e-merchandising. It powers the selling strategies that increase sales by 30% through increased conversion and average order value. Prediggo is a flexible solution that is easy-to-useOur intuitive back-office makes it easy to automate and optimise the most complex merchandising ! Only a few days integration neededPrediggo is the only “complete” solution that does not require integration with your ERP, Cookies or Javascript. Our solutions work on a data export, so they integrate in days, not weeks.  A superior serviceSince we started in 2008, customer service has been one of our core values. So it is no wonder that our customer's have reported a 100% satisfaction rate in our 2012 and 2013 surveys!

module.name: shopgate
module.description: Shopgate ti consente di ottenere la versione mobile del tuo negozio, oltre ad applicazioni per iOS e Android! La nostra soluzione è raccomandata da PrestaShop, poiché è perfettame
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Shopgate ti consente di ottenere la versione mobile del tuo negozio, oltre ad applicazioni per iOS e Android! La nostra soluzione è raccomandata da PrestaShop, poiché è perfettamente integrabile attraverso un semplice plugin. Per integrare il tuo negozio bastano alcune ore e nessun investimento!﻿﻿
module.additional_description: Questo è il modo più facile per loro di trovare quello che cercano. Con Shopgate, i visitatori che utilizzano un dispositivo mobile diventano clienti: caricamento veloce, ottimizzazione per touch screen, navigazione chiara, metodi di pagamento per il mobile ottimali, SEO e branch locator con GPS.

module.name: realexredirect
module.description: Realex Payments Redirect for Prestashop enables you to process transactions from all major credit and debit cards through our Hosted Payment Page
module.author: Coccinet
module.description_full: Realex Payments Redirect for Prestashop enables you to process transactions from all major credit and debit cards through our Hosted Payment Page. If you don't already have a Realex account, you may apply for one on our website or call us on 020 3178 5370. ﻿
module.additional_description: Download for free to benefit from great features such as: Unrivalled Customer Support﻿﻿ 3DSecure & Fraud Card Storage (RealVault) Dynamic Currency Conversion

module.name: ferbuy
module.description: FerBuy is a payment method allowing merchants to offer risk free payments by invoice and in installments
module.author: Invertus
module.description_full: FerBuy is a payment method allowing merchants to offer risk free payments by invoice and in installments.﻿
module.additional_description: The installation and configuration is fast and simple.﻿ As a merchant you can use FerBuy to benefit from more sales and a higher average purchase value. Your customers can pay later and they don’t have to use a credit card to check out. FerBuy comes at low fees for merchants giving you more margin on your sales. As FerBuy takes the risk for all approved transactions, there will be no risk for you as a merchant.

module.name: sofortbanking
module.description: Offri SOFORT Banking fra le possibilità di pagamento nel tuo checkout e guadagna così più clienti!
module.author: Touchdesign
module.description_full: Offri SOFORT Banking fra le possibilità di pagamento nel tuo checkout e guadagna così più clienti!
module.additional_description: Condizioni attraentiFacile integrazioneNessuna registrazione necessaria per l’acquirentePratico e comodo per i tuoi clienti, grazie all’utilizzo dei loro abituali dati di home bankingSicuro grazie al codice d’accesso e alla password dispositivaConferma della transazione in tempo reale

module.name: ecopresto
module.description: You are starting your retailing business and you are looking for products to sell? Already e-retailer you are looking to add products to your existing catalog without purchasing additional stock? Eco
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: You are starting your retailing business and you are looking for products to sell? Already e-retailer you are looking to add products to your existing catalog without purchasing additional stock? Ecopresto was built for you!   Ecopresto, leading dropshipping market place, offers access in a few clicks to tens of thousands of references (sport, leisure, beauty, lingerie, accessories, home, garden, wellness).   With the module, focus on your sales, technology is under control. ﻿ For less than 1 euro per day without engagement access our catalog!
module.additional_description: Choose from tens of thousands of products on dropshipping Sell first then pay.Your sale is shipped directly to your customer ... and you sell again!

module.name: desjardins
module.description: An easy and effective way for PrestaShop users to create their online store at very competitive prices
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: An easy and effective way for PrestaShop users to create their online store at very competitive prices.

module.name: seur
module.description: Transportation system, the first express transportation company in Spain and integrated logistics
module.author: Línea Gráfica
module.description_full: Transportation system, the first express transportation company in Spain and integrated logistics. We put all our experience to ensure best service delivery in Spain and Portugal, Canary Islands, Balearic Islands, Ceuta and Melilla.
module.additional_description: Compatible with all 1.5 and 1.6 PrestaShop versions.﻿Total integration with PrestaShop, picku requests, order tracking and proof of delivery.Rate checking in real time.Home delivery or pick up through SEUR PUDO’s network.

module.name: simplifycommerce
module.description: Simplify Commerce, an online payment solution, features a low, flat rate with no extra fees, two-day funding and major brand acceptance. Sign up takes minutes
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Simplify Commerce, an online payment solution, features a low, flat rate with no extra fees, two-day funding and major brand acceptance. Sign up takes minutes. With easy PrestaShop installation, your business can start selling right away.
module.additional_description: Built by MasterCard, a global leader in the payment industry, our merchants benefit from:Fast merchant signup in minutesSimple, flat 2.85% + 30₵ rate provided by acquirer with no hidden feesOmni-channel payment solution for website, mobile and eCommerce storeAccepting major card brandsQuick two-day fundingHighest Level 1 PCI certification

module.name: boxdropshipment
module.description: Spedisci con un Click! eLogistics è un sistema di spedizione completamente integrato, che genera i documenti di spedizione, il traking number e la richiesta di ritiro in modo completamente automatico
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Spedisci con un Click! eLogistics è un sistema di spedizione completamente integrato, che genera i documenti di spedizione, il traking number e la richiesta di ritiro in modo completamente automatico dal tuo back-office.
module.additional_description: - eLogistics è semplice: spedisci con un Click in pochissimi secondi - Il modulo è totalmente integrato - crea le spedizioni direttamente dal tuo sito - Guadagna tempo: i dati della spedizione saranno inseriti in automatico! - Sai sempre quanto spendi, grazie a tariffe semplici, comprensibili e “all-inclusive” - Offri il servizio di consegna eccellente di DHL: veloce e sicuro! - Scegli tra spedizioni nazionali ed internazionali, Economy ed Express - Preparati per DropOff: offri un servizio flessibile! - È gratuito! Provalo!

module.name: prestastats
module.description: PrestaStats is the leading Business Analytics dashboard & Abandoned Carts Monitor enabling you to see business critical data from your PrestaShop store on any device, at any time, and as far back
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PrestaStats is the leading Business Analytics dashboard & Abandoned Carts Monitor enabling you to see business critical data from your PrestaShop store on any device, at any time, and as far back as your Prestashop store has been running.
module.additional_description: Know what’s happening on your PrestaShop store at any moment, from any device. PrestaStats gives you the power to drive your business to success with an easy to use, clutter free dashboard, that displays your most critical business data, in a visual and consolidated way.

module.name: netreviews
module.description: Le recensioni sito e prodotti dei tuoi clienti possono farti aumentare le vendite! Raccoglile con la soluzione Recensioni Verificate e ottieni le stelline in adwords grazie alla nostra partnerhip con
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Le recensioni sito e prodotti dei tuoi clienti possono farti aumentare le vendite! Raccoglile con la soluzione Recensioni Verificate e ottieni le stelline in adwords grazie alla nostra partnerhip con Google.
module.additional_description: Raccogli e pubblica le recensioni dei tuoi clienti con la società indipendente Recensioni Verificate! ﻿  Perchè noi?  Comincia da subito ad approfittare:  - Di una soluzione interamente personalizzabile  - Di tariffe che comprendono la raccolta di recensioni sito e recensioni prodotto  - Di prezzi imbattibili-Del tasso di risposta più alto del mercato!  - Delle nostre applicazioni facebook - Di un certificato di autenticità approvato da NF Service  - Di un’offerta SENZA VINCOLO MINIMO DI DURATA

module.name: payplug
module.displayName: PayPlug – Pagamento on-line semplice e sicuro!
module.description: Con PayPlug, il pagamento on-line non è mai stato così semplice! La nostra soluzione francese di pagamento on-line si utilizza con o senza contratto VAD e si installa in pochi clic
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Con PayPlug, il pagamento on-line non è mai stato così semplice! La nostra soluzione francese di pagamento on-line si utilizza con o senza contratto VAD e si installa in pochi clic.
module.additional_description: La nostra soluzione moderna e intuitiva ti permette di migliorare il tasso di conversione grazie alle funzionalità e a un’ergonomia pensate per l’e-commerce. Grazie a PayPlug non perdi più nessuna vendita e semplifichi i tuoi pagamenti on-line:Pagamento rapido senza registrazioneDesign moderno ed epuratoRilevamento automatico del tipo di carta

module.name: pigmbhpaymill
module.description: Easy multi-currency credit & debit card payments directly in your shop with no setup or monthly fees. Let your customers pay in a selection of payment methods to benefit from higher conversions
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Easy multi-currency credit & debit card payments directly in your shop with no setup or monthly fees. Let your customers pay in a selection of payment methods to benefit from higher conversions.
module.additional_description: Integrating PAYMILL is a breeze, simply download the module to install and follow the steps  to sign up. Give your customers the flexibility of paying in a selection of payment methods, which includes all the major credit and debit cards   Your Payments Secured With our Level-1 PCI Compliance we’ve got you covered with the highest security and data protection standards. Making it even faster for you to start accepting online payments.   Accept Payments Worldwide Reach a global market by accepting payments from around the world and in up to 100 different currencies.   One-Click Checkout Save your customer’s time by letting them store their payment information securely on our servers for future purchases. All they need to do is click to buy!

module.name: vtpayment
module.description: VTPayment creates payment addons for PrestaShop to help merchants accept payments from more than 3.5 billion UnionPay cardholders
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: VTPayment creates payment addons for PrestaShop to help merchants accept payments from more than 3.5 billion UnionPay cardholders. We are honored to provide addons to PrestaShop merchants with 11+ transaction currencies for options.
module.additional_description: Merchant could accept payments from more than 3.5 billion UnionPay cardholders, and this number is still increasing from time to time.Support multiple currencies for website pricing, and get all payment in 4 major currencies within only 2 business days for fast payout.Security, Satiability and Easy Management.Participate and enjoy various marketing events and activities to all Chinese under UnionPay family.Could register for a live account with few minutes, by updating account could upgrade account level and get to launch quickly.

module.name: yousticeresolutionsystem
module.description: Youstice è un modo rivoluzionario con cui oggi le aziende gestiscono i reclami. Aziende e clienti comunicano tramite un'applicazione che permette loro di interagire dialogando in maniera amichevole
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Youstice è un modo rivoluzionario con cui oggi le aziende gestiscono i reclami. Aziende e clienti comunicano tramite un'applicazione che permette loro di interagire dialogando in maniera amichevole. Il reclamo viene risolto in pochi clic, risparmiando tempo e aumentando la fedeltà del cliente.
module.additional_description: Youstice è uno strumento online multilingue di nuova generazione, in grado di fornire soluzioni rapide ed eque ai reclami dei clienti di tutto il mondo. Aiuta le aziende a comunicare e gestire i reclami senza intermediari, sia all'interno che all'esterno dei confini nazionali. Attraverso Youstice, in pochi clic entrambe le parti possono comunicare e negoziare direttamente, risolvendo così i problemi in una manciata di minuti. Pur essendo standardizzato e automatizzato, si tratta di un processo sofisticato che propone opzioni per un dialogo costruttivo tra il consumatore e il commerciante. Nel caso in cui non si raggiunga un accordo, Youstice offre la possibilità di sottoporre il reclamo alla revisione di un professionista neutrale, scelto dalle parti affinché prenda una decisione rapida ed equa. Risolvendo i reclami rapidamente e in modo equo, i commercianti diventano venditori affidabili, guadagnando la fedeltà dei clienti, evitando i feedback negativi e coinvolgendo maggiormente la clientela. Per ulteriori informazioni guarda il nostro video e visita il nostro sito web. VantaggiIntercetta le esigenze dei tuoi clienti e aumenta la loro fedeltà – grazie a un approccio personalizzato ai reclami dei clientiRisparmi tempo – per risolvere un reclamo bastano pochi clicRiduci al minimo le recensioni negative ed eviti che i clienti ne pubblichino in futuro risolvendo i loro reclami in modo rapido ed efficienteRicevi aiuto per espanderti a livello internazionale – avrai accesso al nostro ecosistema formato da una rete di marketplace, organizzazioni di consumatori, marchi di garanzia e provider di servizi di risoluzione delle controversie online (ODR)

module.name: klikandpay
module.description: Klik & Pay is a holistic secured payment solution accessible via PC, tablets and/or smartphone
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klik & Pay is a holistic secured payment solution accessible via PC, tablets and/or smartphone. Partners with many Banks and International acquirers, Klik & Pay assists its merchants for 15 years, in France, Europe and all over the World. Whatever your industry, we have a solution for you:
module.additional_description: No start-up fees or monthly subscriptionOnly 1.45% and 0.3 € per transactionA team available to help you secure your transactions and increase your conversion rate.

module.name: dpdpoland
module.description: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop
module.author: Invertus
module.description_full: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop. All necessary tools for preparation and tracking of parcels have been consolidated and can be managed from one single interface. DPD Poland offers the highest quality of services, which will contribute to your clients’ satisfaction. The DPD official module enables complete shipment management, allowing you to easily prepare the necessary shipment documents and tracking your parcel.
module.additional_description: Once the module has been installed and configured, the user will gain access to important features for the easy handling and sending parcels.

module.name: clickline
module.description: In Clickline we strive to make your life easier. As a merchant, you won't have to waste time searching for the best deal among delivery companies. Just let Clickline
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: In Clickline we strive to make your life easier. As a merchant, you won't have to waste time searching for the best deal among delivery companies. Just let Clickline.com find it for you !

module.name: erpillicopresta
module.description: Save time on e-shop management with the 1st free and adaptable ERP: Client orders, Shipping, Suppliers, Stock management and export, Inventory, and more
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Save time on e-shop management with the 1st free and adaptable ERP: Client orders, Shipping, Suppliers, Stock management and export, Inventory, and more.
module.additional_description: When it comes to added professionalism for the management of your client and supplier orders, advanced configuration of your supplier forms, or even managing and exporting your stock and running your inventory, the 1-Click ERP pack will be your preferred assistant to help you manage your store in a simple, efficient way! Managing your back-office will no longer be a problem! The 1-Click ERP pack will save you precious time in managing your e-commerce: Up to 2h per day, according to the merchants who use it!

module.name: mapubfacile
module.description: Boost your online brand awareness by delivering banners on high profile media brands websites. Target your customers and your potential new prospects for your business
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Boost your online brand awareness by delivering banners on high profile media brands websites. Target your customers and your potential new prospects for your business.
module.additional_description: Set up your online advertising in 5 minutesDeliver your ad banners on high class media websites Follow your performances on a customized dashboardA hotline to get answers to all your questions

module.name: bluesnap
module.description: BlueSnap is a global payment gateway and so much more
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BlueSnap is a global payment gateway and so much more.  We offer the widest global support in the industry plus 110 different payment types including all of Tier 1 credit cards, diner cards, PayPal, E-checks and wire transfers. PrestaShop and BlueSnap help shoppers make purchases easily and securely with the free BlueSnap module.
module.additional_description: Sell globally with no developmentEasy all-in-one global payment module supportingVISA, MasterCard, Amex, Discover, JCB, Diners Club, Carte BleuePaypal, Alipay, Ukash, Skrill, and more+ 110 of the most preferred alternative payment methods worldwideDon’t install more than one module for paymentsReduce cart abandonment with localized checkout pagesModule automatically renders checkout page in shopper’s local language, local currency, and preferred local payment typeMore transactions approved because of our intelligent payment routing technologyCompetitive pricing starting at 2.9% + 30C per approved transactionCheckout page optimized for mobile and desktop

module.name: loyaltylion
module.description: Aggiungi un programma fedeltà al tuo negozio in pochi minuti
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Aggiungi un programma fedeltà al tuo negozio in pochi minuti. Aumenta la fedeltà dei clienti e la loro soddisfazione premiando le iscrizioni, le recensioni, gli accessi, le raccomandazioni e gli acquisti. I clienti raccolgono i punti e possono riscattarli in cambio di buoni acquisto da spendere nel tuo negozio, incrementando gli acquisti ripetuti. Ricevi informazioni sulla clientela, ad esempio i più inclini a fare raccomandazioni e i migliori clienti. Personalizza il design ed il testo per adattarlo al tuo negozio.
module.additional_description: Aumenta il volume del carrello del 9,4% in mediaAumenta le vendite tramite acquisti ripetutiAumenta il numero dei clienti grazie alla nostra funzionalità "invita un amico"Aumenta la soddisfazione dei clientiDifferenzia il tuo negozio dalla concorrenzaRaggiungi migliaia di contatti sui social network - leggi il rapporto sul negozio che ha raggiunto più di 10.000 persone nell'arco di tre mesi. Perché noi? Centinaia di negozi e-commerce in tutto il mondo si sono affidati a LoyaltyLion, dai piccoli e medi rivenditori fino ai più grandi d'Europa.

module.name: sellstrom
module.description: Simplify your shipping process and save money.  PrestaShop and Sellstrom Global Shipping have partnered to offer you a fast and efficient solution to your shipping needs
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Simplify your shipping process and save money.  PrestaShop and Sellstrom Global Shipping have partnered to offer you a fast and efficient solution to your shipping needs. Our module simplifies your shipping process by automatically creating your shipping labels.  Your customers choose the desired carrier and service from our multicarrier platform -- USPS, UPS, FedEx and DHL services.  Once your customer completes their order, the shipping label is automatically created and available for you to print within the order section of your PrestaShop Store.  Completely automated and hassle free!!!
module.additional_description: Your customers choose from 4 carriers – USPS, UPS, FedEx, DHL.Full USPS service selectionSave time and reduce errors.  The shipping label is auto created from the customer orderDomestic or international shipmentsRate customizationTry the SGS Module for the 1st month for free.  The module is $9.95 per month

module.name: nostotagging
module.description: Aumenta il tasso di conversione e il valore medio degli ordini, offrendo raccomandazioni prodotti personalizzate ai tuoi clienti durante la lora navigazione
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Aumenta il tasso di conversione e il valore medio degli ordini, offrendo raccomandazioni prodotti personalizzate ai tuoi clienti durante la lora navigazione.
module.additional_description: Nosto consente di offrire ad ogni cliente un'esperienza personalizzata di shopping attraverso le raccomandazioni in base al loro comportamento degli utenti unici - l'aumento di conversione, valore medio degli ordini e la fidelizzazione dei clienti di conseguenza. L'offerta di nosto per PrestaShop commercianti è unico: è estremamente facile configurazione e in tempo reale le raccomandazioni del prodotto sono a differenza di qualsiasi cosa PrestaShop commercianti hanno avuto accesso a prima. Hai solo bisogno dare il modulo un paio di giorni per imparare il comportamento degli utenti sul tuo sito. Il nostro modello di prezzo scale come si fa. Con nessuna spesa o impegni minimi, leghiamo il nostro successo alla tua, prendendo solo una piccola% delle entrate vi aiutiamo a generare. Installare Nosto GRATUITAMENTE in pochi minuti, e unirsi a oltre 4000 rivenditori in tutto il mondo utilizzando Nosto far crescere il loro business e deliziare i propri clienti! Aumenta le vendite online e aiuta i tuoi clienti a godere lo shopping online!Aumenta il Average Order Value con Cross- e Up-selling racomandazioniBoost il Tasso di conversione con raccomandazioni pertinente del prodottoScopri di più sui tuoi clienti attraverso una dashboard in tempo realePaga solo una piccola % del gettito generato da Nosto !

module.name: paypalmx
module.description: PayPal es la forma más fácil, rápida y segura de enviar y recibir pagos en línea
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PayPal es la forma más fácil, rápida y segura de enviar y recibir pagos en línea. Es uno de los principales impulsores del comercio electrónico en México y en los EE.UU.

module.name: powatag
module.description: In Powa stiamo lavorando con PrestaShop per rivoluzionare il comportamento d’acquisto dei consumatori
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: In Powa stiamo lavorando con PrestaShop per rivoluzionare il comportamento d’acquisto dei consumatori. Aggiungendo il modulo PowaTag al tuo e-commerce potrai offrire ai tuoi clienti una procedura d’acquisto semplificata.
module.additional_description: Grazie a PowaTag, potrai:Aumentare i tuoi tassi di conversione online e da mobileConsentire ai tuoi clienti di acquistare direttamente dalla scheda prodottoConsentire ai tuoi clienti di scaricare il catalogo ed acquistare in tutta comodità dal proprio dispositivo mobileSperimentare una soluzione multicanale che ti darà realmente la possibilità di aprire nuovi canali di vendita, generando nuovi profitti per te PowaTag: La multicanalità per rivenditori e brand. Guarda il video qui sotto:

module.name: olark
module.description: Olark live chat is the easiest way to boost your sales, help solve issues and understand your customers
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Olark live chat is the easiest way to boost your sales, help solve issues and understand your customers. Give your customers the answers they need immediately and gain powerful insights about what they want for relationships that last.
module.additional_description: Easily chat with your customers and make the sale!Targeted Chat rules to interact only with the customers that perform certain actionsCustomize the design to match your website color palletteAdvanced Reporting for awesome operator insightsAdvanced JavaScript API for deeper integrations

module.name: easymarketing
module.description: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yours
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yourself - Sign-up for a free, 3 months trail
module.additional_description: easymarketing is the exclusive Google SME Premium Partner in the UK easymarketing’s technology manages your Google Shopping campaign to maximise both impact & sales We take the worry out of online marketing saving YOU time & money   Get YOUR ad campaigns onlineConnecting to your Web-shopManaging your Data FeedCreating your CampaignsUploading onto Google & facebook  Maximise YOUR sales & minimise YOUR customer acquisition cost Not only does easymarketing’s state of the art technology offer a 38% lower customer acquisition cost* right from the start it is also recommended & fully supported by Google with the highest certification levelManaging your marketing campaignsOptimising CPC biddingOptimising to impact sales - constantly

module.name: brinkscheckout
module.description: Brink’s Checkout, a service provided by The Brink’s Company, allows merchants from 200 countries to accept online payments from customers worldwide in multiple currencies and languages in
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Brink’s Checkout, a service provided by The Brink’s Company, allows merchants from 200 countries to accept online payments from customers worldwide in multiple currencies and languages in addition to the most widely used payment methods (Visa, MasterCard, Amex, Diners, Discover, JCB, PayPal, and Debit Card). In addition, it comes with a no-cost state-of-the-art fraud prevention. Merchants access all of that with a simple, low-cost, per performance pricing.
module.additional_description: The all-in-one of paymentsGet all you need to start accepting payments now: payment gateway and processor, merchant account, fraud prevention and free module.Trust all the wayOur transparent checkout combined with our brand gives customers the feeling of trust, safety and certainty. This way they know they are in your website and a secure area, where they can complete their purchase.Maximize conversionThe seamless payment experience provides users several different payment options including the ability to pay in several different currencies and languages.Maximize salesWith Brink’s Checkout, sell in over 200 countries, using 26 different currencies in 15 different languages.Minimize fraud and have peace-of-mindBrink’s Checkout is the only Checkout platform with over 15 years of experience selling internationally. The patented technology and 300 variables gives merchants the confidence to sell globally in the most convenient and reliable way. Additionally, our fraud specialists review each and every transaction to ensure you have the peace of mind you need to carry on with your business.

module.name: dotpay
module.description: Dotpay enables fast and handy Internet payments accepting for sellers in e-shop based on PrestaShop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Dotpay enables fast and handy Internet payments accepting for sellers in e-shop based on PrestaShop. Start your account and see how much you may earn accepting payments online via Dotpay!
module.additional_description: Cooperation between Dotpay and PrestaShop is an answer for sellers needs who minimalizing efforts want to increase their selling opportunities. The possibilities offered by PrestaShop are not limited only to basic Internet shop functions. They offer many more - versatile offer of developing an offer, sales analyses, banner systems applying and comments, RSS channels or goods comparison. A useful functionality is individual creation of graphics changing this way the e-shop looks. What is more, the program may be developed by external modules.

module.name: sarbacanedesktop
module.description: Go to the module to start your campaign and benefit from 500 free credits ! Easily create and send stunning newsletters to inform your community and increase customer loyalty
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Go to the module to start your campaign and benefit from 500 free credits ! Easily create and send stunning newsletters to inform your community and increase customer loyalty. The module synchronizes your PrestaShop store and your Sarbacane Desktop emailing software.
module.additional_description: Support:  multilingual technical support available to help you - phone and emailmany online resourcesvideos, tutorials, guides, tips ... Easy: Simply create beautiful responsive newsletters thanks to the EmailBuilderOptimal deliverability: Your customers really receive your emailsAdvanced Features: targeting, segmentation, Split test...

module.name: prestashippingeasy
module.description: ShippingEasy automates your shipping across all major carriers. Orders download in real time and rules streamline carrier, service and package selections
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: ShippingEasy automates your shipping across all major carriers. Orders download in real time and rules streamline carrier, service and package selections. Quickly fulfill orders placed on your website and marketplaces, including eBay, Amazon, Sears, Newegg and more. An easy to use system backed by exceptional service from shipping specialists. And, the best USPS rates - up to 46% off. FREE starter plan for up to 50 packages a month.
module.additional_description: Prestashop + ShippingEasy = the right combination for easy, fast, shipping with built-in savings  Sync all your orders in one locationSave up to 46% with the best USPS ratesEasy carrier integration with USPS, UPS and FedExFREE starter plan for up to 50 shipments per monthExceptional customer support Prestashop syncs automatically with ShippingEasy, downloading in all your order details in minutes and helping you assign shipping preferences, rates and delivery options in real-time. No cut and paste. No manual update. Save up to 46% Finally, access to competitive USPS rates – in fact, the cheapest around. For example: USPS Priority Mail: Medium Flat Rate box: retail $12.35, our price: $10.65 – a savings of $1.70 on a single shipment. Built in savings! All part of the service.

module.name: reforestaction
module.description: Adopt an ecofriendly image and optimize your online reputation for free: give your customers the opportunity to plant a tree for €1 when purchasing on your shop
module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.description_full: Adopt an ecofriendly image and optimize your online reputation for free: give your customers the opportunity to plant a tree for €1 when purchasing on your shop.
module.additional_description: With the module Responsible Purchase by Reforest' Action, your customers can plant a tree in the world to compensate the CO2 emissions of their purchase. Thanks to you, they act for the planet and they let it know on Facebook and Twitter. So you get better visibility on the Internet, free of charge.

module.name: expressmailing
module.description: First Marketing module fully integrated with the PrestaShop interface, including emailing with 10,000 free emails per month i.e
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: First Marketing module fully integrated with the PrestaShop interface, including emailing with 10,000 free emails per month i.e. 400 per day, and the possibility to send FAX and SMS at very low prices.
module.additional_description: With more than 12 years of experience in direct marketing, we provide the ideal tool to broadcast your marketing campaigns (emailing, faxing & Sms). Fully integrated with PrestaShop Express-Mailing module allows you to precisely select recipients of the campaigns from your PrestaShop customers or visitors by using various filters. You can easily send them newsletters, discounts or special offers, report your season sales or announce your corporate events. Quick and intuitive, you can send your email campaigns to 200 or even 10 000 contacts in less than 5 minutes. Experience the Express-Mailing module now, and boost your sales !

module.name: bpostshm
module.description: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop. Not only are the different delivery methods (to home or office location, to a parcel locker or a postal point) immediately available in your shop, you can also manage most of the settings directly via the Prestashop backend, print the labels and access the Track & Trace. The add-on is free of charge, still a contract with bpost should be signed in order to have access to the bpost logistical solutions.
module.additional_description: -       Easy set-up, plug & play -       Responsive design -       All bpost delivery methods are immediately available:@home@bpostParcels lockerInternational-       Configure prices per delivery method, independently and directly in the module -       Use most common options for your sendings (signature, basic insurance, automatic second presentation) -       Print directly from the backend -       Track & Trace your parcels from the backend

module.name: ovhhosting
module.description: Your online store is too slow? OVH offers hosting solutions optimized for the needs of a prestashop store with free installation and support 24/7
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Your online store is too slow? OVH offers hosting solutions optimized for the needs of a prestashop store with free installation and support 24/7.

module.name: dpdfrance
module.description: Use the DPD France module to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home addresses, business addresses, etc. Enjoy an automated system for managing back-office orders
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Use the DPD France module to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home addresses, business addresses, etc. Enjoy an automated system for managing back-office orders. Choose a high-quality service, choose DPD France: deliveries in 24/48 hours, detailed tracking information online, local support and more. Integrate our module in just a few clicks and enjoy several innovative delivery options to satisfy your customers.

module.name: mercadopagobr
module.description: MercadoPago payment module: receive payments with a customizable and standard checkout, and bar code payment
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: MercadoPago payment module: receive payments with a customizable and standard checkout, and bar code payment. MercadoPago provide the highest security standard with PCI Level 1 certification and an internal robust fraud analysis. With MercadoPago, you can accept major credit card brands, offer installments options and receive all funds upfront, and allow consumers to pay in websites or mobiles. Credit Card Customized Checkout: this feature will allow merchants to have a customized checkout for credit card payment. Thus, it will be possible to customize its look and feel, customers won’t be redirected away to complete the payment, and it will also reduce the checkout steps improving conversion rate. Customized Bar Code Payment: this feature will allow merchants to have a customized bar code payment. It reduces the checkout steps improving conversion rates. The bar code payment can be also customized with the merchant's logo. Standard checkout: this feature will allow merchants to have a standard checkout. It includes all payment methods (i.e. all credit cards, bar code payment, account money) and all window types (i.e. redirect, iframe and modal). Customization is not possible for this type of checkout. Sign up here!
module.additional_description: MercadoPago can help Prestashop’s merchants increase their sales with its cutting edge payment technology, providing solutions that fit with the clients’ needs:  - Online and real-time payment processing- High approval rate through an internal robust fraud analyses - High conversion with our customized checkout- Customizable bar code payment - Potential new consumers due to our large user base – 120 million in Latin America- Highest Level 1 PCI certification- Major credit card brands acceptance- Payment in installments- Two-day or fourteen day funding*- Omni-channel payment system for website and mobiles- One-click to pay with MercadoPago’s standard checkout- Sellers protection program*- Easy to install module  * According to MercadoPago’s terms and conditions.

module.name: gapps
module.description: Google Apps for Work is a cloud-based productivity suite which can help you work from anywhere, on any device. Get professional email, online storage, shared calendars, video meetings and more
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Google Apps for Work is a cloud-based productivity suite which can help you work from anywhere, on any device. Get professional email, online storage, shared calendars, video meetings and more.Try Google Apps Free for 30 days by Downloading the Module and getting a coupon code
module.additional_description: Gmail Get professional business email with Google-powered search, up to 30GB of storage, offline support, spam protection, integrated video meetings and much more.  Calendar Arrange meetings at times that work for everyone, respond to invitations from your inbox, stay on schedule with event reminders and access your calendars offline.  Drive Store your files securely online, access them from anywhere, export with ease and always know you have the latest version.  Hangouts Launch and join video meetings, group chats and voice conversations from your laptop, tablet or phone.  SheetsCo-edit spreadsheets from any location or device, view revision history with a simple click and exchanging feedback through discussion-style comments.  Slides Craft professional presentations through real-time teamwork, and enhance them with videos, images, drawings and transitions.  Sites Build an intranet for your company, a project site for your team or a portal for customers without writing a single line of code.  Docs Create, share and edit documents with your whole team in real time, without ever having to click save.

module.name: chronopost
module.description: Offer the services of the leading express shipper to individuals in France! Offer the choice and flexibility of multi-choice delivery: ship to a home, a pickup point, or an office!
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Offer the services of the leading express shipper to individuals in France! Offer the choice and flexibility of multi-choice delivery: ship to a home, a pickup point, or an office!
module.additional_description: Choose the carrier that delivers more than 80 million packages per year and serves 230 countries.Save time with simplified managementGet real-time tracking of your shipments

module.name: dpdgroup
module.description: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop
module.author: Invertus
module.description_full: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop. All necessary tools for preparation and tracking of parcels have been consolidated and can be managed from one single interface.
module.additional_description: Once the module has been installed and configured, the user gains access to functionalities which make shipment management easy. This solution will help optimize and automatize the shop’s performance when it comes to handling and sending parcels, including:  printing of waybills (label, delivery of goods protocol)ordering courierstracking your parcelsviewing shipment history

module.name: zeleriscarrier
module.description: The Zeleris PrestaShop extension integrates Zeleris as a shipping provider for the online store. The extension allows direct integration of shipping orders into Zeleris Transportation System
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Zeleris PrestaShop extension integrates Zeleris as a shipping provider for the online store. The extension allows direct integration of shipping orders into Zeleris Transportation System.
module.additional_description: The Zeleris PrestaShop module allows quick and simple integration of the online store with Zeleris Transportation System. The module also adds many features that simplify the management of transport within the online store. Zeleris (Telefónica Servicios Integrales de Distribución, S.A.U.), is a Telefónica Group company specialized in the provision of logistics and domestic and international transportation services both for individuals and businesses. Zeleris has a customer base that includes several of the most important companies in Spain in the fields of e-commerce and distance selling and is the main logistics supplier for Telefonica Group in Spain.

module.name: nimblepayment
module.description: Nimble Payments is an online payment gateway supported by BBVA that enables you to accept online payments flexibly and safely
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Nimble Payments is an online payment gateway supported by BBVA that enables you to accept online payments flexibly and safely. With services to help you manage your business: qualified customer care service in Spanish and soon customized funding.

module.name: protectedshops
module.description: Automatically protected against legal proceedings with the AGB Connect ® module Protected Shops offers an online service for creation of legal texts like terms and conditions, imprint, privacy po
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Automatically protected against legal proceedings with the AGB Connect ® module Protected Shops offers an online service for creation of legal texts like terms and conditions, imprint, privacy policy and many more. Automatic update.  2 months for free for PrestaShop users!
module.additional_description: Individual legal texts through questionnaires creation The survey considers the characteristics of the different countries, payment procedures, logistic providers, tracking solutions, social networks and can easily generate the legal texts for nearly every individual business model legally correct.   Automatic update when new laws or court decisions become effective The maintenance happens independently from the online traders. The module synchronizes the legal texts regularly with the servers of Protected Shops and cares for the actuality of the legal texts. The trader can decide which documents he wants to use and the frequency of the updating can be determined by the customer himself. The update is necessary when new laws or court decisions become effective, so that the online shop is always up to date. At that point, online traders are protected against legal proceedings.

module.name: shiptomyid
module.description: Ship2MyID allows shipping without an address. Generate new transactions that were not possible before. Enable REAL gifting by delivering gifts to cell numbers, or emails, social ID of the receiver
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Ship2MyID allows shipping without an address. Generate new transactions that were not possible before. Enable REAL gifting by delivering gifts to cell numbers, or emails, social ID of the receiver.  A PrestaShop store will increase consumer’s ability to send gifts up to 98%, and speed up mobile checkout by 75x.

module.name: liveperson
module.description: LiveEngage is the modern way to connect with your online shoppers.  Increase sales conversions and overall satisfaction
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: LiveEngage is the modern way to connect with your online shoppers.  Increase sales conversions and overall satisfaction. The single user, free plan is totally free for one user, who can take unlimited chats with as many people at a time. Plus, we aren’t limiting any features, so you get full access to all of LiveEngage.
module.additional_description: LivePerson LiveEngage is the modern way to talk to visitors on your online store and on their mobile devices.  Stores that connect with their customers in real-time see an increase in conversions and overall satisfaction.

module.name: stickngo
module.description: The Stick&Go sheets allow you to have in a unique document your order form and your delivery label! Simple, 2 in 1, without any configuration, neither module addition, the Stick'Ngo sheets hav
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Stick&Go sheets allow you to have in a unique document your order form and your delivery label! Simple, 2 in 1, without any configuration, neither module addition, the Stick'Ngo sheets have been developed together with PrestaShop teams Your client's delivery address is perfectly printed on a removable label . No operations is required to use the Stick'Ngo sheets. TEST STICK&GO NOW, RECEIVE YOU FREE TRIAL PACK!

module.name: securitypatch
module.description: This module solves a security issue for PrestaShop 1.4, 1.5, and 1.6. Install this module, and it will apply the security patch that was released in late July 2015
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module solves a security issue for PrestaShop 1.4, 1.5, and 1.6. Install this module, and it will apply the security patch that was released in late July 2015. You can learn more about the issue by reading the security announcement.

module.name: openpayprestashop
module.description: Openpay is the best payment gateway in México
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Openpay is the best payment gateway in México. Accept multiple payments methods instantly like: credit/debit cards, cash payments in over 12,00 convenience stores and wire transfer (SPEI), everything with payments  notifications in real time.
module.additional_description: This module allows you to accept 3 different payment methods directly on your site through your Openpay account. Users select payment method during the checkout process and never leave your site, resulting in a better experience for the user, and more successful conversions for you.
